name: Eldritch Versatility
description: Whenever you reach a level in this class that grants the Ability Score Improvement feature, you can do one of the following: Replace one cantrip you learned from this class's Pact Magic feature with another cantrip from the warlock spell list; Replace the option you chose for the Pact Boon feature with one of that feature's other options; If you're 12th level or higher, replace one spell from your Mystic Arcanum feature with another warlock spell of the same level.
